website_summaries.verdict: A streamlined top-load water cooler that offers a combination of great performance and energy efficiency.
pros: Filterless design means the water cooler is easy to maintain and clean
Compatible with a variety of round and square bottle sizes
Comes with a built-in nightlight for low-light environments
cons: Water pressure can start to fluctuate as the inside starts to need maintenance or cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like plastic for first few gallons, then works fine.
customer_reviews.text: So far it tastes like plastic, hoping that clears up soon. Now I’m just wasting water cycling water through... **EDIT** It took about three gallons of water to finally rinse away the plastic taste. Now it runs fine and there’s no problem with the unit. Just be prepared to waste some water in the beginning...
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Soul

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. If your 5-gallon bottle has no lid when you put it on, you have to be really quick to avoid spilling some. Otherwise, it is quiet enough and cold enough. We don't use the hot tank. I like how the drip tray grate is flat, so you can set a glass on it and push the button to fill the glass. The spout extends down enough that larger containers, such as a gallon jug, can be filled, although they won't set on the grate.
customer_reviews.author: SubterraneanMuskrat

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.
customer_reviews.text: Cold drinking water, hot beverage water. Room temp/ cool water only a few degrees different than cold water. This temp will vary depending upon last run of compressor. Would not say noisy. You know when it is cooling. Slightly more noise than refrigerator. Fills glasses at a quick pace. Night light is a nice feature. Nice looking machine. It came form Calif. warehouse. Depending on your height and straighten you may want to pay attention to height of opening for bottle placement about 3" from floor. Slim design. Using it about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: TOADY TOASTIE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our lake House to help cut down on plastic water bottles.......many of which would go to waste as the kids wouldn't finish the whole bottle. At the end of vacation, we had way too many plastic bottles to recycle. Set this up last month and really happy with he purchase. The water is nice and cold, makes little to no noise and easy to use. We have not used the hot water feature yet, maybe in winter time. We buy 5 gallon bottles from local grocery store for less than $6 a bottle. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H

customer_reviews.title: 3 temperature water 👌
customer_reviews.text: Best value! Super happy with my purchase, my favorite part is that have 3 temperatures water selection hot, cold and room temperature and is perfect for small spaces if I can I give it 10 stars :D
customer_reviews.author: Elvia arenas

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait a few weeks until we tried it out. But it seems to work pretty well. the cold water is cold and the room temperature water is pretty much room temperature. Hot water seems to work fairly well. Did not wanna pay the standard monthly fee that comes with renting one I think this is worth the money so far will write another review in about a year to see how it holds up. If there was one short fall I would say it is a little lower than some of the other standard ones for dispensing water but it’s manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawsp

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Primo top load water dispenser for a couple of weeks now. The water comes out clean and cold and it is relatively easy to install the bottles. So far, I'm very pleased with my purchase, considering the price. The only thing I would caution is it being a top loader, be prepared to use the included brace/bracket to secure it to the wall. I would especially make this point for people who have small children and/or pets who could bump into the dispenser. Mine is placed in a corner of my kitchen, which has kept it stable so far without the bracket.
customer_reviews.author: LUNDO5

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this water cooler 5 months ago and the hot water stopped working. I reached out to the Zen Direct Co. and because it is out of the return window time they are not willing to help us in anyway. This is very disappointing because we use the hot water daily! That is one of the main reasons we have a water cooler. We have had other water coolers that have lasted years. I wouldn’t buy from this company again. Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: rachel anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold water!
customer_reviews.text: Works best with Primo water bottles. I looked over reviews prior to buying the product & noticed a few comments abt a certaim taste when new.. I boiled purified water, poured into the dispenser & ran through each spout.. Results were NO TASTE just fresh tasting water EDIT** So u can buy the type of caps separate at a water store no need to just by primo water bottles which are pretty expensive which i feel defeats the purpose of having a water dispenser(to save money) 6.99 for refills compared to 1.50 or less is a big difference
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. I bought one in April by March it wasn't working. I woke up in the morning to find my kitchen flooded. It droped all the water. When I call to get it replace they were giving me the run a round.. They sent me a link to "trouble shoot the water dispenser" it took me 3 calls for someone to actually send me a replacement but it took over a month to get the new one. So disappointed. Am just hoping the second one they sent doesnt do the same as the first one🙏
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: This does what it says it will, but it is very low to the ground. We have to bend over to get water and stay bent over until the cup is filled. It also feels a little flimsy --top heavy with the water bottle on it, so it requires an unsightly anchor to fix it to the wall. OK overall but I wish I had bought something a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in a small corner
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Environmental purchase. Everyone has to do their part! Small motor sound I am getting used to hearing in the kitchen, but like I said it is a very quiet humming and the unit fits well in the corner and is nice to look at. Company came over and saw it, three days later called to tell me they purchased one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Renee

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put four 5 gallon bottles through it without any issues. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Water at the ready
customer_reviews.text: We love this water dispenser. It was easy to set up. Fits the water jugs from Safeway and Winco easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for my fitness studio
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this in my fitness studio. I was renting a unit for 4 years at $10 a month. I could have already bought 2 of these. I’m a petite person and I was able to put it up in 5 mins with water bottle installed and plugged. Hasn’t leaked . It’s been about 3 weeks since installed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered earlier than expected, it came very well packaged and I could tell that they took extra care to ensure everything arrived in top shape. I was thoroughly impressed and am very pleased with it so far. It was easy to assemble and I was able to do it on my own. Highly recommend this if you’re looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The water cooler buttons are poorly made , they get stuck and water keeps leaking . very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan GRANT

customer_reviews.title: Cold water with a price...
customer_reviews.text: The product works well but its very loud. Took some getting used to the loud hum but it 's worth it for fresh, cool water.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cowey

customer_reviews.title: Not good / too short
customer_reviews.text: Water does not get very cold. The options are more like warm, warmer, hot. Primo customer service sucks. I reached out directly through their website about having issues refilling the 5 gallon jugs and they were rude and short with me. The actual dispenser is wayyyyyyy shorter than it should be. Not what I was anticipating at all. You have to crouch down on your knees to even hold the cup under the fill spot. I definitely wouldn’t recommend this version or this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gary lannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit! Keeps the water nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit! Keeps the water nice and cold, even after i used the cold water on accident to fill up my Keurig, I was still able to get a cold glass of water to drink! Nice and quiet as well, doesnt make the same motor sounds like other units I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Camron Curnutt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect....AND Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: The convenience of this machine cannot be stressed enough. Water is always cold/hot depending on preference at any given time. I don't regret this purchase one bit! My roommates and I make full use of it! (Even if I am the only one that actually goes and refills the water -_- lol) The dispenser even comes with coupons that allows you free refills and bottles. A fan of this dispenser and a fan of this company
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J

customer_reviews.title: Killer Kooler!
customer_reviews.text: What a great cooler! We needed a new one to replace our old Oasis model from the sixties so after reading reviews I picked this one and I'm so glad I did! It was easy to put together, very quiet and looks and works great! It's a fantastic value that I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: OK RocknRoller

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price. Very satisfied with quality of this water dispenser and everything works perfectly. Cold water is cold, hot water is plenty hot for tea or soup. And best part it was much cheaper than buying a different brand that is more expensive. Paid $140 and used a $15 amazon discount, couldn’t be happier with the purchase. If you are in the market for one, in highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Zamora

customer_reviews.title: It has 3 options!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this one! It has a HOT, really COLD, and a button for room temperature! I love that! It's so easy to use and its sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Henry S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Installed this machine a few weeks ago and have not had any issues so far. The water get cold enough for those hot days and hot enough for to make instant coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Water is great with this !
customer_reviews.text: THIS WATER MACHINE IS PRIMO !! HEAT AND COLD WORKS GREAT AND IT HAS A LIGHT TOO !
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Looks really great and works perfectly . We literally just had to set up the excess water tray and plus it in. I also love how it’s child proof .
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. It’s simple to set up and fast to be able to use. It looks good. Happy customer right here!🙂
customer_reviews.author: Judith Thompson

customer_reviews.title: If you’re buying bottled water 1-2x’s a week, this is a must!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and a great alternative to buying bottled water all the time. It also came with a coupon for a free water jug! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: JulHa

customer_reviews.title: Great watercooler so far
customer_reviews.text: Great watercooler so far. I love this one compared to my last one. The water comes out really fast, so it doesn't take forever to fill up cup. Back to work :)
customer_reviews.author: Justin Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with the Product, shipping time no so much.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product. It has three options for water temperature, regular, cold, and hot. It also looks nice in the kitchen. My only complain was the shipping time. I ordered this for my elderly father and the expected arrival date was postponed, so i had to help him when he needed water.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this water cooler and even better for the price and Energy Star qualified! Wish it was a little taller and had a bottom storage, but it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: Catsol

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and attractive style
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and attractive style. I like that the water is dispensed by pressing a button vs. a lever. I have seen other water coolers where the handles are made cheap and break or stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Icy cold
customer_reviews.text: The water comes out icy cold, cool, or piping hot. It’s amazing, the only negative thing I have to say is, if you are refilling your own water jugs, you have make sure the cooler is completely empty or you’ll have water everywhere. This cooler is intended for refill jugs that are sealed. Still it is a 5 out of 5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Holli lacombe

customer_reviews.title: The 3  temperatures Room,Hot & Cold
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this one! It has a HOT, really COLD, and a button for room temperature! I love that! It's so easy to use. Almost a year Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Benkendorfer

customer_reviews.title: as advertized
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this and it was easy to set up and works well. So far (a month) no problems!
customer_reviews.author: SEG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to install, small footprint for any room. Overall great value and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it for long but it’s been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A must have dispenser at work. Looks beautiful and works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Keep super cold water
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cooler, not only does the water come out really cold on hot days but hot water is boiling hot
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted one for years, this one was a good choice
customer_reviews.author: chuck lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space
customer_reviews.text: Had one just like this and gave it to my son, works great
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: It dispenses water. 😲
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser does exactly what it is suppose to do. Love the hot water feature as I use it for my pour overs. Cold water is cold. What else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jones

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler I have my cold and hot instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love that we bought this. Size is perfect for our duplex and the color makes it attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: water dispancer
customer_reviews.text: easy and matches for my small appartment with the small room and easy to move any place coz not so heavy
customer_reviews.author: Rino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our office. No Problems so far. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Helena R. Alston

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a touch noisy
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. My only complaint is that it’s kind of noisy when the water chiller kicks on. It makes a humming/buzzing noise that is definitely audible but not overly obnoxious. We are buying another one for our cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mishoe

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works good. No problems. I like that it has hot water.
customer_reviews.author: corinne

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase!! Hot water is extremely hot, perfect for tea. Quality product, works great, love it!
customer_reviews.author: JR77

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: Working perfect at home. Definitely worth the purchase. I do wish the Led light was a button integrated to the front panel instead of a hidden switch in the back of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: An excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced expensive service rental in our workout studio with this unit. So far, very good unit. Quiet, good temperature management and smaller than the one we replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product because of how easy it is to use. We use it as a way to fill our baby bottles. It’s great to use the hot, room temperature, and chilled water. We love it and would recommend it to anyone who needs a simple water dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works like expected!! Very well!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dang water cooler ever!! The cold is really cold and the hot is very hot!! Love it and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've used your product for a few years and decided I wanted to treat myself to an upgrade. I absolutely love the three temp options, saves me time and money to boot. Highly recommend. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori-Ann Stuewe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The water doesn't get cold. It comes out lukewarm and hot but not cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that wasn’t to expensive. I read some of the negative reviews and was a little unsure. But went a head and bought it anyways. I’ve had it for a bout 4 months now, and it works perfectly. No leaks!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: the best thing yet
customer_reviews.text: looks good in my kitchen I get hot water for my tea so wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Love how sleek it is and especially like the night light - very unexpected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I have drank 10 gallons of ice cold water over the past 2 weeks. This machine has changed my life and I cannot believe I waited this long to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of providing cold as well as hot water. Fits in well with the rest of our stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Package excellent. Instructions, very easy to follow and set up Cold water is cold, fresh water is fresh, hot water is VERY HOT. Excellent for my seven year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It leaks after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use it started leaking. Contacted the seller and did not get a response. We had to buy a new one from Costco at a very similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Ozel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Super quiet. Not big and bulky. Had steaming hot water and ice cold water within 12 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cold is very cold and hot gets pretty hot. Looks nice and appears to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this water cooler
customer_reviews.text: I Love this water cooler. i was buying water and renting (for free) from a major retailer and it was expensive. this coller was well worth the money and i get the galons from local stores. The cooler has two temperatures for cold warer and a safety feature for hot water which makes it convenient for my kids to press the buttons and get water on their own. Added bonus is the Night light. Great investment, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Water is cool and fresh. Much better than bottle water and better for the environment. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just have it a few days but love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Just have it a few days but love it so far. Very quiet. The water is cold and hot when needed. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Knocke

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and is working fine no problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. I use the hot , the cold and even the room temp . Looks great couldn’t b more pleased
customer_reviews.author: K Janecke

customer_reviews.title: The water cooler at our developer office
customer_reviews.text: Hot tea at work? Yes please! Hot cocoa at work? Yes please! Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: Child safety lock
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and so safe my toddler likes to try and copy me when I get water so the child safety lock comes in handy
customer_reviews.author: Wintar Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described I mean it is a water cooler so not much bling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition our home
customer_reviews.text: Our water is very harsh. Water filters and softeners don't help much. This cooler solved all of our drinking water problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: It’s quite and small
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger but I can’t complain it does it’s job correctly
customer_reviews.author: StepBroBryan

customer_reviews.title: Fast flow
customer_reviews.text: Much beter than my cooler from Sparklets. Only sad discount coupons arrived after my purchase, 20% off.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I liked that all the temps of water tasted good. And I used it for cooking & hot drinks
customer_reviews.author: Latricia N.

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup, easy to use. Water is NICE AND COLD.
customer_reviews.text: easy to setup, easy to use. Water is NICE AND COLD.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my water dispenser! Easy to use even my toddler uses it. Love that it has the option to not use the hot water, kid friendly for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Perfect height. Nice hot water. Ice cold water. Room Temperature water. Looks really stylish in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has three water temperatures
customer_reviews.author: ADETOYESE ADEOYE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: HAVE USED IT FOR 2 MONTHS ALMOST AND WATER IS COLD AND HOT IS HOT ENOUGH FOR TEA !
customer_reviews.author: Dorr A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: unable to refill this cooler without primo refill from Lowes which is very very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Primo Water is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, how easy it was to assemble and was having my hot tea in no time
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Not as tall as I would have liked it to be
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as I would have liked it to be, but otherwise it is fine no issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Dispenser nice just like described, works great better than the I was renting monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Cooler at ANY Price
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler is extremely nice - the best we've ever had. We wouldn't trade it at any price and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not dispense hot water or cold water. Read ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not dispense hot water or cold water. Read reviews thought maybe just customers over reacting. I was wrong. Don’t be wrong too
customer_reviews.author: michael r witte

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it was plugged in it started making a lot of noise. it wouldn't cool the water. Amazon did everything possible to help get it replaced. They were very responsive to get it replaced. The new one is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE COMPANY IS GREAT IN TAKING BACK RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: THE COMPANY IS GREAT IN TAKING BACK RETURNS...BUT...FIRST - HOURS OLD ...COLD WATER WAS " NOT" GETTING COLD AT ALL... AND THEN , HOT WATER SEEMED WAY TOO HOT - MAKING US THINK - MAYBE REVIEWS OF UNIT CATCHING FIRE WERE TRUE... WE DECIDED TO RETURN COOLER...THEN, WHEN EMPTYING UNIT TO RETURN TO MANUFACTURER THE MIDDLE SPIGOT STOPPED WORKING - NO WATER WOULD COME OUT...RETURNED UNIT SAME DAY ...AGAIN COMPANY WAS FANTASTIC AT SENDING RETURN LABEL IMMEDIATELY...BUT WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PARTICULAR MODEL...WE'RE GOING BACK TO OUR OLD WATER UNITER SUPPLIED BY WATER BOTTLE COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: james e. lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nasty taste
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to the Water Cooler to save on plastic bottles. It has a horrible taste! I have purchased the same water for years so I know it's not the Hinkley Springs water. It's that plastic taste. I've already run 10-5 gallon jugs of water through it. If anyone knows how to correct that nasty taste please send me a note. I can't drink it and I continue to buy plastic bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: There are better options
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk, in my opinion. Have had issues with leaking for the past six months (bought it less than a year ago). Replaced the water bottles, as they suggested, and still leaks. Checked the gaskets and reseated them, as they suggested, and still leaks. Leaks out of a breather hole, as well as along the rim that supports the water bottle. Going with another brand from now on. Sounds like others have had better luck with this model; hope you do too if you decide to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great but....
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if it didn't take so long to get that nasty plastic taste out of the water. We went through 3 - 5 gallon jugs before the taste was completely gone. I recommend flushing the unit with a hose for a long time (to at least have run 15 gallons through) to get that taste out of the unit. Other than that the darn thing is awesome and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Dee W.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Very little maintenance. Basically took it out of the box and plug it in. Hot water is hot chocolate hot and cold water does not need ice in it. Very happy with product. Just a FYI.... make sure you flip all the switches in the back or the hot and cold will not be turned on.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler and don’t know how I ever lived without it!! We used to buy endless amounts of bottled water and always felt so guilty about the environmental impact. I am a total water snob and never liked Brita filtered water either. We get reverse osmosis refills from a local vendor and it tastes great from this cooler. The size is perfect for our small house, it’s quiet and is super easy to use. The hot water is scalding and the cold water is ice cold. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a stuck pig
customer_reviews.text: 2 days after setting up the cooler I came home to water all over my floor. I traced it to the location shown in the pictures. I contacted the seller who would not send a replacement part (which I understand). I would need to box up the whole thing and send it back so they could verify WE didn't break it. Huge hassle. I figured I could fix it. Tried crazy glue on the cracks. Tried tape. Tried the $14 replacement part. Still leaks. Going to try a bead of silicone next.
customer_reviews.author: JandC

customer_reviews.title: Water gets cold, and the hot water is just ...
customer_reviews.text: Water gets cold, and the hot water is just right for tea, and coco. Delivery was a couple day's early. No issues at all
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Texas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my old water dispenser bit the dust. It matches my LG washer and dryer perfectly. I don't use the hot or cold feature because the unit is not near an AC outlet; besides, I don't need these features. It only cost a little more than a "cheapie" and will probably outlast me (I'm 82).
customer_reviews.author: David J Zaring

customer_reviews.title: 3 water temps + quiet motor + Primo water = Primo choice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than anticipated. We love having 3 water temp options. The room temp option is great for giving the dogs water. Looks nice. It isn't loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great water dispenser for home or office
customer_reviews.text: Great water dispenser, easy to assemble. Have bottles delivered from local company and we switch out as needed. Sturdy and easy to use/clean. Only wish there was a way to change the temperature setting for the hot water. It is plenty hot and if I am making the baby bottle, I have to add some cool or cold water so it's not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye Run

product_meta.title: Primo Top Loading Water Cooler - 3 Temperature Settings, Hot, Cold & Cool - Energy Star Rated Water Dispenser with Child-Resistant Safety Feature Supports 3 or 5 Gallon Water Jugs [Black w/Stainless]
feature_bullets: Dispenses ice-cold, cool, and piping-hot water with the push of a button
Hot water includes child-resistant safety feature
Spill-proof bottle holder with Leak Guard prevents spills while loading bottles of Primo water
Black stainless steel accents and stainless steel water reservoirs
UL Certified and Energy Star Rated
